control.controller
Class AcademicStaffController

java.lang.Object
  control.controller.GeneralUserController
      control.controller.RegisteredUserController
          control.controller.AcademicStaffController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoordinatorController
public class AcademicStaffController
extends RegisteredUserController

The AcademicStaffController class is a control class that provides operations for academic staff. This class extends from RegisteredUserController, which means AcademicStaffController have all the functions of RegisteredUserController. In addition, AcademicStaffController provide the function to add Publication which can be Book, ConferencePaper and JournalPaper and check the duplication at the same time.

See Also:
Repository, AcademicStaff, Publication

editProfile

public void editProfile(java.lang.String fullName,
                        StaffTitle title,
                        int researchGroup)
editProfile is used to edit user's own profile. The detials which can be changed could be fullName, title and researchGroup

Parameters:
fullName - The full name of academic staff
title - The title of academic staff
researchGroup - The research group number which academic staff belongs to
See Also:
AcademicStaff, Repository

addBook

public boolean addBook(java.lang.String IDNumber,
                       java.lang.String publicationTitle,
                       java.util.Set<java.lang.String> authorSet,
                       java.util.Date publishDate,
                       java.lang.String publisherName,
                       java.lang.String publishPlace)
addBook provide the method to write new book to the file.

Parameters:
IDNumber - The unique ID for book
publicationTitle - The title of book
authorSet - The authors of book
publishDate - The upload time of book
publisherName - The publisher name of book
publishPlace - The publish place of book
Returns:
Return boolean. If add book successfully, it will return true. Else, return false
See Also:
Book, Repository, Publication

checkDuplicationOfBookPublication

private boolean checkDuplicationOfBookPublication(java.lang.String publicationTitle,
                                                  java.lang.String publisherName,
                                                  java.lang.String publishPlace)
checkDuplicationOfBookPublication provides the function to avoid add duplicated book to the file

Parameters:
publicationTitle - The title of book
publishDate - The upload time of book
publisherName - The publisher name of book
publishPlace - The publish place of book
Returns:
return boolean. If duplication appear, it will return true. Else, return true.
See Also:
Book, Publication, Repository
